relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Campus Safety is always on Patrol of the Campus to make sure our students are safe.
There are clubs on Campus that reflect what students like. The Surf Club, The Volleyball Club and more.
Well we always celebrate birthdays with a little of laughter and food.
I have fun with my friends. We go on late night food runs, play video games in the Lounge, make random youtube tv shows, make random films or commercials, and sometimes go sleep at the beach.

Vanguards Caf is a very interesting place. You have a salad bar where you can create your own salad. You have a Deli Bar where you can create your own Sandwich. Then you have 3 food sections where the Chefs create something.

Dorm life is a lot of fun no matter where you go. Here you have amazing residents that will hang out with you. If you live in Huntington Hall you also have Floor Sisters from Laguna Hall across the towers lobby. It holds a great community.
The Professors are great at what they do. They are here to help students learn and will spend extra time with you.
Study, make friends, get to know your professors, and enjoy life.
Vanguard University is a great school that values learning and a great community. It is a school where you will always have someone helping you reach your goals. At Vanguard Your Story Matters.
pageTitle: Vanguard University of Southern California Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {11024=You are started off with welcome week in August. This week is just to help you get to know people and the campus and surrounding areas before school even starts. You feel at home within a week. Everybody here treats you like a friend, you cannot walk to class without talking to at least one person on the way! Your floor is your family, and after being here only one semester we all are like sisters! And who doesn't like being 20 minutes from Disneyland???, 211220=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Great for anyone in the Christian faith or interested in the Christian faith. Tips for prospective students This is a school where you can get grounded in your faith. Am enjoying being here The academics, teachers, and students are wonderful to be around. Am learning a lot Learning more about independence. Login to rate or flag the reviews Charity from Palm Desert, CA 01/13/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 4 people found this review useful. 1 person found this inaccurate. 4 of 52 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Friendly, Christian, Laid back (it is definitely a laid back attitude around here), anyone who wants a small campus and wants to know everyone. It's just a good place for almost everybody!
